data.eml:eml: Pictorial key to species of the genus Ropalidia Guerin-Meneville, 1831 (Hymenoptera, Vespidae) from China, with description of one new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tan, Jiang-Li, Van Achterberg, Kees, Chen, Xue-Xin (2014): Pictorial key to species of the genus Ropalidia Guerin-Meneville, 1831 (Hymenoptera, Vespidae) from China, with description of one new species. ZooKeys 391: 1-35, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.391.6606, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.391.6606
